de.mrapp.android.preference.adapter

Class ColorPaletteAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ColorPaletteAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.adapter.ColorPaletteAdapter

  • public class ColorPaletteAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ColorPaletteAdapter.ViewHolder>
    An adapter, which provides colors for visualization using a RecyclerView.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ColorPaletteAdapter.ViewHolder
      The view holder, which is used by the adapter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorPaletteAdapter

        public ColorPaletteAdapter(@NonNull
                           android.content.Context context,
                           @NonNull
                           int[] colorPalette,
                           int previewSize,
                           @NonNull
                           AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape previewShape,
                           int previewBorderWidth,
                           int previewBorderColor,
                           @Nullable
                           android.graphics.drawable.Drawable previewBackground)
        Creates a new adapter, which provides colors for visualization using a RecyclerView.
        Parameters:
        colorPalette - The color palette, which should be provided by the adapter, as an Integer array. The color palette may not be null
        previewSize - The size, which should be used to preview colors, as an Integer value in pixels. The size must be at least 1
        previewShape - The shape, which should be used to preview colors, as a value of the enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape. The shape may not be null
        previewBorderWidth - The border width, which should be used to preview colors, as an Integer value. The border width must be at least 0
        previewBorderColor - The border color, which should be used to preview colors, as an Integer value
        previewBackground - The background, which should be used to preview colors, as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if no background should be shown

    • Method Detail

      • indexOf

        public final int indexOf(int color)
        Returns the index of a specific color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color, whose index should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The index of the given color or -1, if the adapter does not contain the color

      • getItem

        public final int getItem(int position)
        Returns the color that corresponds to a specific position.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the color, which should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The color that corresponds to the given position as an Integer value
